summary: App should auto-connect to BrandMeister and AllStar (IAX) using only user credentials, with server URLs preconfigured (no user-entered URL).
architectural_notes: Maintain a predefined list of BrandMeister master servers (including 3102.master.brandmeister.network for US) and select/connect automatically after successful login.
Connection endpoints (BrandMeister masters, AllStar IAX) should be derived from provider selection and/or credentials, not user-entered URLs.

existing_features.title: Modify the BrandMeister (DMR) connection flow so users are not required to type or paste any server URL/hostname: when the BrandMeister preset/quick setup is chosen, automatically select a BrandMeister master server (prefer "BrandMeister United States" when present) and keep manual server entry hidden behind an Advanced section (or removed).

Modify the AllStar (IAX/DVSwitch) connection flow so users are not required to type or paste any gateway/server URL/hostname: when the AllStar preset/quick setup is chosen, automatically set the IAX gateway/server to "allstarlink.org" (or a directory-provided AllStarLink entry when available), and keep any freeform gateway/server input hidden behind an Advanced section (or removed).

Ensure the appâ€™s post-credential flow auto-saves and navigates to PTT once required non-URL fields are provided for BrandMeister and AllStar, matching the "credentials only" onboarding expectation (similar to DroidStar/DVSwitch).

new_feature_requests.summary: BrandMeister login should auto-select/connect to the appropriate master server(s) (e.g., 3102.master.brandmeister.network US) using only username + hotspot security password (no URL input).
AllStarLink login should automatically establish the IAX connection using only username + password (no URL input).
Remove/avoid any UI requiring users to enter server URLs; apps should only prompt for login credentials similar to DroidStar/DVSwitch.
Update the built-in BrandMeister United States network address to the correct BrandMeister US master hostname "3102.master.brandmeister.network" so that any default/preset selection uses this value.

projectName: Auto-select BrandMeister US and AllStarLink servers so users enter credentials only (no URLs)
